con:oAuth2Profile.con:name: RPA API
con:oAuth2Profile.con:accessToken: def authRepository = testRunner.getTestCase().getProject().getAuthRepository() def entrylist = authRepository.getEntryList() entrylist.each(){ entry -> log.info('Entry "' + entry.getName() + '" class = ' + entry.getClass()) }

con:eventHandlers.name: RequestFilter.filterRequest
TestRunListener.afterStep
